00013 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00014    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00015    type) \
00016    ListField * variable; \
00017    if ((variable = new ListField) == NULL) \
00018       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00019    if (area != NULL) \
00020       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00021    if (groupField != NULL) \
00022       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00023    variable->setHorizontallyScrollable(horizontallyScrollable); \
00024    variable->setVerticallyScrollable(verticallyScrollable); \
00025    variable->setType(ListField::TYPE_##type);
00026 
00027 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, \
00028    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00029    type) \
00030    GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00031       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00032    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00033 
00034 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, \
00035    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00036    type) \
00037    GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00038       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00039    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00040       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00041 
00042 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, \
00043    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00044    type) \
00045    GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00046       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00047    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00048    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00049       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00050 
00051 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00052    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00053    type) \
00054    GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00055       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00056    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00057    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00058 
00059 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_PM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00060    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00061    type) \
00062    GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00063       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00064    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00065    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00066    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00067 
00068 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_SM(variable, area, groupField, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00069    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00070    type) \
00071    GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00072       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00073    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00074    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00075       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00076 
00077 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_PSM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00078    horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, \
00079    type) \
00080    GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD(variable, area, groupField, \
00081       horizontallyScrollable, verticallyScrollable, type) \
00082    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00083    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \

00086 
00087 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_COLUMN(variable, listField, editable, alignment, heading) \
00088    ListField::Column * variable; \
00089    if ((variable = new ListField::Column) == NULL) \
00090       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00091    listField->appendColumn(variable); \
00092    variable->setAutoResizing(true); \
00093    variable->setEditable(editable); \
00094    variable->setAlignment(ListField::ALIGN_##alignment); \
00095    variable->setHeading(heading);
00096 
00097 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_COLUMN_S(variable, listField, width, editable, alignment, heading) \
00098    ListField::Column * variable; \
00099    if ((variable = new ListField::Column) == NULL) \
00100       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00101    listField->appendColumn(variable); \
00102    variable->setWidth(width); \
00103    variable->setEditable(editable); \
00104    variable->setAlignment(ListField::ALIGN_##alignment); \
00105    variable->setHeading(heading);
00106 
00107 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_ROW(variable, listField) \
00108    ListField::Row * variable; \
00109    if ((variable = new ListField::Row) == NULL) \
00110       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00111    listField->appendRow(variable);
00112 
00113 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_ROW_P(variable, listField, position) \
00114    ListField::Row * variable; \
00115    if ((variable = new ListField::Row) == NULL) \
00116       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00117    listField->insertRow(position, variable);
00118 
00119 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_CELL(variable, row) \
00120    ListField::Cell * variable; \
00121    if ((variable = new ListField::Cell) == NULL) \
00122       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00123    row->appendCell(variable);
00124 
00125 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_TEXTELEMENT(variable, cell, text) \
00126    TextElement * variable; \
00127    if ((variable = new TextElement) == NULL) \
00128       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00129    cell->appendElement(variable); \
00130    variable->setText(text);
00131 
00132 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_IMAGEELEMENT(variable, cell, image) \
00133    ImageElement * variable; \
00134    if ((variable = new ImageElement) == NULL) \
00135       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00136    cell->appendElement(variable); \
00137    variable->setImage(image);
00138 
00139 #define GLAZIERY_LISTFIELD_IMAGEELEMENT_I(variable, cell, imageId) \
00140    ImageElement * variable; \
00141    if ((variable = new ImageElement) == NULL) \
00142       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00143    cell->appendElement(variable); \
00144    variable->setImageId(imageId);
